step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fists closed and muscles tight as you bring your arms in. Focus on controlled breathing.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale as you relax your muscles and open your hands.
Great job on this step! Ensure your arms extend horizontally to shoulder height while exhaling and relaxing.
You're doing well with the arm extension. Focus on keeping the movement smooth and controlled throughout.
Excellent completion of the first repetition! You're following the instructions well.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers into fists and tighten your muscles as you inhale.
Good opening of the hands and arm extension. Keep the exhale smooth as you relax your muscles.
You're maintaining good form here. Ensure your arms are reaching out horizontally to shoulder height.
Keep up the steady pace. Focus on the coordination between exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Fantastic job completing both repetitions! Your movements were consistent and followed the exercise cues.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and muscles engaged as you inhale, then smoothly open your hands and relax as you exhale. Continue practicing this for optimal lymphatic drainage.
